def_en: If you say that there is not an iota or not one iota of something, you are emphasizing that there is not even a very small amount of it.

def_cn: (用于强调否定)一点儿也不,一点儿也没有
def_en: You can use an iota or one iota to emphasize a negative statement. Not an iota or not one iota means not even to a small extent or degree.
